### Power Law with Exponential Cutoff (PLEC)


The integral near E=0 converges iff γ<1.

$$
f(E) = A · E^{-γ} · \exp\left(-\frac{E}{E_c}\right)
$$

- [gammapy](https://docs.gammapy.org/2.0/user-guide/model-gallery/spectral/plot_exp_cutoff_powerlaw.html)
- [PLSuperExpCutoff](https://fermi.gsfc.nasa.gov/ssc/data/analysis/scitools/source_models.html#PLSuperExpCutoff)

### Smooth Broken Power Law (SBPL)

$$
f(E) = A · \left( \frac{E}{E_b} \right)^{-\gamma_1} · \left[1 + \left(\frac{E}{E_b}\right)^m\right]^{(\gamma_1 - \gamma_2)/m}
$$

- [Overview of broken power law functions and fitting them to data](https://gist.github.com/cgobat/12595d4e242576d4d84b1b682476317d)
